executable.title: MR Image Intensity Bias Field Correction
executable.description: This program corrects intensity inhomogeneity artifacts in MR images using a bias field estimated via entropy minimization.
executable.contributor: Torsten Rohlfing, with contributions from Michael P. Hasak, Greg Jefferis, Calvin R. Maurer, Daniel B. Russakoff, and Yaroslav Halchenko
executable.acknowledgements: CMTK is developed with support from the NIAAA under Grant AA021697, National Consortium on Alcohol and Neurodevelopment in Adolescence (N-CANDA): Data Integration Component. From April 2009 through September 2011, CMTK development and maintenance was supported by the NIBIB under Grant EB008381.

double.label: set_padding_value

float.description: Minimum intensity threshold for image foreground.

float.label: thresh_min

float.description: Minimum intensity threshold for image foreground.

boolean.label: log_intensities
